name: Passageways
description:
Passageways was based of off Phantom Ride by Daniel Crooks. To me Phantom Ride was an experience that slowly become one that is almost maddening/Entrancing with the consistent industrial visuals, and so this endless loop tries to recreate that.

Hope you enjoy.

Music is:

"Rising Tide" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

And a beep sound I did
